==== moduleExports1.ts (3 errors) ====
    export module TypeScript.Strasse.Street {
    	export class Rue {
    		public address:string;
    	}	
    }
    
    var rue = new TypeScript.Strasse.Street.Rue();
                             ~~~~~~~
